item.description:
meet fellow non-believers for pizza and lively talk

- - - -

All Souls Unitarian Universalist Church:
60 Huntington St, New London, ct

12/31/2011 (Need Soup Kitchen Volunteers)

9am-12pm setting up and/or preparing lunch.... 
12pm-3pm serving and cleaning up from lunch, cooking soup; 
4pm -6:30ish setting up, serving and cleaning up supper

They will also be distributing hat, scarves, gloves (new or gently used) to the soup kitchen patrons that day - We will be holding a drive for it during our December meeting.

group.name: Atheist Humanist Society of CT and RI

item.name: Atheist Humanist Society of CT and RI monthly meetup
